name: Sweclockers 6.0 - Floating Ribbon Bar (Compact)
description:
Strips off the whole header ribbon bar with menus and everything, and glues it to the top of the browser instead. It'll always be with you.
No more tedious scroll-up-to-top every time one need to switch to another page or site-tab.

Compact version.
additional_info:
For version 6.0 of Sweclockers.com. 
2015-05-25: Fixed a minor transparency problem with the search result field.
2017-08-28: Fixed parts being lost while scrolling.
